concept.title: VMware virtual volumes and NetApp Element software
concept.shortdesc: VMware VVols with NetApp Element-based QoS enables you to manage storage performance from vCenter on a per-virtual machine disk (VMDK) basis for a volume’s minimum, maximum, and burst IOPS settings, create storage performance policies using VMware Storage Policy-Based Management (SPBM), and eliminate the 256-LUN limit of a traditional virtual machine file system (VMFS).
